sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO group_insurant_collect( id,com_user_id,group_policy_id, user_id, company_name,insurant_family_seq, insurant_inner_seq, staff_seq_no, creator, gmt_created, modifier, gmt_modified, is_deleted, insurant_name, certi_type, certi_no, trade_no, birthday, social_security_no, medical_insurance_place, gender, base_certi_type, base_certi_no, relation_to_staff, insurance_plan, staff_type, phone, email, effective_date, data_type, sub_company, department, salary, nationality, household_location, marital_status, nation, occupational_code, occupational_type, position, transfer_account_bank, account_holder, account_no, entry_date, work_experience, staff_no,is_renewal, remark,project_expiry_date,project_name,project_code, insurant_type,register_address,has_social_insurance,extra_info,organization_code,collect_status) VALUES ( #id#,#comUserId#,#groupPolicyId#, #userId#, #companyName#,#insurantFamilySeq#, #insurantInnerSeq#, #staffSeqNo#, #creator#, NOW(), #modifier#, NOW(), 'N', #insurantName#, #certiType#, #certiNo#,#tradeNo#, #birthday#, #socialSecurityNo#, #medicalInsurancePlace#, #gender#, #baseCertiType#, #baseCertiNo#, #relationToStaff#, #insurancePlan#, #staffType#, #phone#, #email#, #effectiveDate#, #dataType#, #subCompany#, #department#, #salary#, #nationality#, #householdLocation#, #maritalStatus#, #nation#, #occupationalCode#, #occupationalType#, #position#, #transferAccountBank#, #accountHolder#, #accountNo#, #entryDate#, #workExperience#, #staffNo#, #isRenewal#, #remark#, #projectExpiryDate#, #projectName#, #projectCode#, #insurantType#, #registerAddress#, #hasSocialInsurance#, #extraInfo#, #organizationCode#,#collectStatus#)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE group_insurant_collect SET gmt_modified = now()
group_policy_id = #groupPolicyId#
company_name = #companyName#
insurant_family_seq = #insurantFamilySeq#
insurant_inner_seq = #insurantInnerSeq#
staff_seq_no = #staffSeqNo#
creator = #creator#
gmt_created = #gmtCreated#
modifier = #modifier#
is_deleted = #isDeleted#
insurant_name = #insurantName#
certi_type = #certiType#
certi_no = #certiNo#
trade_no = #tradeNo#
birthday = #birthday#
social_security_no = #socialSecurityNo#
medical_insurance_place = #medicalInsurancePlace#
gender = #gender#
base_certi_type = #baseCertiType#
base_certi_no = #baseCertiNo#
relation_to_staff = #relationToStaff#
insurance_plan = #insurancePlan#
staff_type = #staffType#
phone = #phone#
email = #email#
effective_date = #effectiveDate#
data_type = #dataType#
sub_company = #subCompany#
department = #department#
salary = #salary#
nationality = #nationality#
household_location = #householdLocation#
marital_status = #maritalStatus#
nation = #nation#
occupational_code = #occupationalCode#
occupational_type = #occupationalType#
position = #position#
transfer_account_bank = #transferAccountBank#
account_holder = #accountHolder#
account_no = #accountNo#
entry_date = #entryDate#
work_experience = #workExperience#
staff_no = #staffNo#
is_renewal = #isRenewal#
remark = #remark#
project_expiry_date = #projectExpiryDate#
project_name = #projectName#
project_code = #projectCode#
insurant_type = #insurantType#
register_address = #registerAddress#
has_social_insurance = #hasSocialInsurance#
extra_info = #extraInfo#
organization_code = #organizationCode#
collect_status = #collectStatus#
WHERE 1 = 1
id = #id#
com_user_id = #comUserId#
user_id = #userId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
FROM group_insurant_collect a1 WHERE id = #id#
SELECT COUNT(id) AS num FROM group_insurant_collect

SELECT COUNT(id) AS num FROM group_insurant_collect a1
a1.company_name =#companyName#
a1.user_id = #userId#

a1.gmt_created >= #startTime#
a1.gmt_created <= #endTime#

SELECT COUNT(id) AS num FROM group_insurant_collect a1 where a1.is_deleted ='N'
group_policy_id = #groupPolicyId#
a1.relation_to_staff in
#typeArray[]#
